entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mount Forest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.7°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or freezing rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain beginning early in the morning then changing to rain late in the morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
